verses.text:
And \w Hezekiah|strong="H3169"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* and \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* \w letters|strong="H0107"\w* also to \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* and \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, that they should \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, to \w keep|strong="H6213"\w* the \w passover|strong="H6453"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

For the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* had taken \w counsel|strong="H3289"\w*, and his \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, and all the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, to \w keep|strong="H6213"\w* the \w passover|strong="H6453"\w* in the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*.

For they \w could|strong="H3201"\w* not \w keep|strong="H6213"\w* it at that \w time|strong="H6256"\w*, because the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* had not \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* themselves \w sufficiently|strong="H4078"\w*, neither had the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* gathered themselves \w together|strong="H0622"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

And the \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w pleased|strong="H3474"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* and all the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w*.\f + \fr 30.4 \ft pleased…: Heb. was right in the eyes of the king\f*

So they \w established|strong="H5975"\w* a \w decree|strong="H1697"\w* to make \w proclamation|strong="H5674"\w* throughout all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, from \w Beer-sheba|strong="H0884"\w* even to \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*, that they should \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w keep|strong="H6213"\w* the \w passover|strong="H6453"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: for they had not \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \add it\add* of a \w long|strong="H7230"\w* \add time in such sort\add* as it was \w written|strong="H3789"\w*.

So the \w posts|strong="H7323"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* with the \w letters|strong="H0107"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* and his \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* throughout all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* and \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and according to the \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Ye \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, turn \w again|strong="H7725"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w*, \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*, and \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and he will \w return|strong="H7725"\w* to the \w remnant|strong="H7604"\w* of you, that are \w escaped|strong="H6413"\w* out of the \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*.\f + \fr 30.6 \ft from: Heb. from the hand\f*

And be not ye like your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and like your \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, which \w trespassed|strong="H4603"\w* against the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, \add who\add* therefore gave them \w up|strong="H5414"\w* to \w desolation|strong="H8047"\w*, as ye \w see|strong="H7200"\w*.

Now be ye not \w stiffnecked|strong="H7185"\w*, as your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \add were, but\add* \w yield|strong="H5414"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H3027"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* into his \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*, which he hath \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: and \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, that the \w fierceness|strong="H2740"\w* of his \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w* may turn \w away|strong="H7725"\w* from you.  +  r 30.8  t be ye…: Heb. harden not your necks *  +  r 30.8  t yield…: Heb. give the hand *

For if ye turn \w again|strong="H7725"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, your \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* and your \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \add shall find\add* \w compassion|strong="H7356"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them that lead them \w captive|strong="H7617"\w*, so that they shall come \w again|strong="H7725"\w* into this \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* \w gracious|strong="H2587"\w* and \w merciful|strong="H7349"\w*, and will not turn \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \add his\add* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* from you, if ye \w return|strong="H7725"\w* unto him.

So the \w posts|strong="H7323"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* from \w city|strong="H5892"\w* to \w city|strong="H5892"\w* through the \w country|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* and \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* even unto \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w*: but they laughed them to \w scorn|strong="H7832"\w*, and \w mocked|strong="H3932"\w* them.

Nevertheless \w divers|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Asher|strong="H0836"\w* and \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* and of \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w* \w humbled|strong="H3665"\w* themselves, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

Also in \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* was to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* them \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* the \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* and of the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, by the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ And there \w assembled|strong="H0622"\w* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w much|strong="H7227"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* to \w keep|strong="H6213"\w* the \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* of unleavened \w bread|strong="H4682"\w* in the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, a \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w great|strong="H7230"\w* \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w*.

And they \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* and took \w away|strong="H5493"\w* the \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* that \add were\add* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and all the altars for \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* took they \w away|strong="H5493"\w*, and \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \add them\add* into the \w brook|strong="H5158"\w* \w Kidron|strong="H6939"\w*.

Then they \w killed|strong="H7819"\w* the \w passover|strong="H6453"\w* on the \w fourteenth|strong="H0702"\w* \add day\add* of the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*: and the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* were \w ashamed|strong="H3637"\w*, and \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* themselves, and brought \w in|strong="H0935"\w* the burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And they \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* in their \w place|strong="H5977"\w* after their \w manner|strong="H4941"\w*, according to the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w sprinkled|strong="H2236"\w* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, \add which they received\add* of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*.\f + \fr 30.16 \ft their place: Heb. their standing\f*

For \add there were\add* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* in the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* that were not \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w*: therefore the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* had the charge of the \w killing|strong="H7821"\w* of the \w passovers|strong="H6453"\w* for every one \add that was\add* not \w clean|strong="H2889"\w*, to \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* \add them\add* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

For a \w multitude|strong="H4768"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \add even\add* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, and \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w*, and \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w*, had \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w cleansed|strong="H2891"\w* themselves, yet did they \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w passover|strong="H6453"\w* otherwise than it was \w written|strong="H3789"\w*. But \w Hezekiah|strong="H3169"\w* \w prayed|strong="H6419"\w* for them, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w pardon|strong="H3722"\w* every one

\add That\add* \w prepareth|strong="H3559"\w* his \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* to \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, though \add he be\add* not \add cleansed\add* according to the \w purification|strong="H2893"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*.
And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* to \w Hezekiah|strong="H3169"\w*, and \w healed|strong="H7495"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* that were \w present|strong="H4672"\w* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w kept|strong="H6213"\w* the \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* of unleavened \w bread|strong="H4682"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* with \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w*: and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* and the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w praised|strong="H1984"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* by \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \add singing\add* with \w loud|strong="H5797"\w* \w instruments|strong="H3627"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.  +  r 30.21  t present: Heb. found *  +  r 30.21  t loud…: Heb. instruments of strength *

And \w Hezekiah|strong="H3169"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* \w comfortably|strong="H3820"\w* unto all the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* that \w taught|strong="H7919"\w* the \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H7922"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: and they did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* throughout the \w feast|strong="H4150"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, \w offering|strong="H2076"\w* \w peace|strong="H8002"\w* \w offerings|strong="H2077"\w*, and making \w confession|strong="H3034"\w* to the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.  +  r 30.22  t comfortably…: Heb. to the heart of all *

And the whole \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w* took \w counsel|strong="H3289"\w* to \w keep|strong="H6213"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*: and they \w kept|strong="H6213"\w* \add other\add* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* with \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w*.

For \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* did \w give|strong="H7311"\w* to the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w bullocks|strong="H6499"\w* and \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*; and the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w gave|strong="H7311"\w* to the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w bullocks|strong="H6499"\w* and \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*: and a great \w number|strong="H7230"\w* of \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* themselves.\f + \fr 30.24 \ft did give: Heb. lifted up, or, offered\f*\f + \fr 30.24 \ft gave: Heb. lifted up, or, offered\f*

And all the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, with the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, and all the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* that came \w out|strong="H0935"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and the \w strangers|strong="H1616"\w* that came \w out|strong="H0935"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and that \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w rejoiced|strong="H8055"\w*.

So there was \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w joy|strong="H8057"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: for since the \w time|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add there was\add* not the like in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

¶ Then the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* and \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: and their \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* was \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*, and their \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \add up\add* to his \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* dwelling \w place|strong="H4583"\w*, \add even\add* unto \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*.\f + \fr 30.27 \ft his holy…: Heb. the habitation of his holiness\f*
